official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 2909 Rogerdale in Houston, Texas, as the "Debra Sue Schatz Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates a certain United States Post Office Building in Houston, Texas, as the Debra Sue Schatz Post Office Building.
